text:
.@AstraZeneca #vaccine doesn’t increase risk compare to other vaccines.
1. The risk of blood clot in general population is 1 in 1000.
2. In women on contraceptive pill is 6 in 1000.
3. Risk of blood clot from #covid19 vaccine is 35 in 17,000,000.

Asif at https://t.co/tXL4eVs4ar https://t.co/MIBe4DcAm4
